channel.title: attack.t1053.003 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1053.003 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Cron Files
item.description: Detects creation of cron files or files in Cron directories. Potential persistence.

item.title: Scheduled Cron Task/Job
item.description: Detects abuse of the cron utility to perform task scheduling for initial or recurring execution of malicious code. Detection will focus on crontab jobs uploaded from the tmp folder.

item.title: Scheduled Cron Task/Job
item.description: Detects abuse of the cron utility to perform task scheduling for initial or recurring execution of malicious code. Detection will focus on crontab jobs uploaded from the tmp folder.
